name: Down with the Ship!
description:
You are a captain of a space shuttle only equipped with basic defenses when suddenly you are overwhelmed by a large fleet of space pirates. It is only a matter of time until you are destroyed. Can you hold them off long enough to save your crew?

Made for Ludem Dare 50 - Extra

I didn't have the time to dedicate a whole weekend to this project. However, I gave myself the same number of hours, just split up throughout the week.

Update 1.1: Tweaked a few UI issues, and re-built using the latest unity engine to fix a reported bug.

Update 1.2: Fixed Onboard Crew counting bug.
